mapper.select: select a.id, a.card_id, a.user_id, a.comment, a.created_at, a.created_by, a.updated_at, a.updated_by, b.picture from comment a left outer join user b on a.created_by = b.id where a.card_id = #{cardId}
mapper.insert: insert into comment values (null, #{cardId}, #{userId}, #{comment}, now(), #{userId}, null, null)
